briefTitle: Open-label Study to Evaluate Clearance of Superficial Basal Cell Carcinoma After Use of Imiquimod 5% Cream
officialTitle: An Open-label Study to Evaluate the Safety and Long-Term Clinical Efficacy of Imiquimod 5% Cream Applied Once Daily 7 Days Per Week for 6 Weeks in the Treatment of Superficial Basal Cell Carcinoma
summary: An open-label study to evaluate the safety and the ability of Imiquimod 5% cream, applied topically, to clear superficial basal cell carcinoma and to keep it clear for 5 years of follow-up.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Sustained Clearance Rate of Superficial Basal Cell Carcinoma (sBCC)
